data.name: Title
data.value: Legal

data.name: Intro
data.value: This page provides information about the source code, third-party components and privacy aspects of this application.

data.name: Section_Usage
data.value: Usage

data.name: Usage_Private
data.value: The application is intended for private use. A technically skilled private user can install and run it as a server application on a home computer.

data.name: Usage_LocalStorage
data.value: Application data is stored locally on the user's machine in a SQLite database, unless configured otherwise.

data.name: Usage_OperatorDisclosure
data.value: If the application is made available to other persons (e.g., in a home network or beyond), the operator must provide information about the processing of personal data (purposes, retention, recipients) and about any third-party services used.

data.name: Section_Source
data.value: Source / Repository

data.name: Section_ThirdParty
data.value: Third-party components

data.name: ThirdParty_Intro
data.value: This application uses open-source libraries (NuGet) and optional third-party web APIs.

data.name: ThirdParty_NuGet
data.value: NuGet packages (excerpt): Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.*, Microsoft.Data.Sqlite, Nager.Date (holidays), System.Text.Json, etc.

data.name: ThirdParty_Apis
data.value: Optional web APIs: AlphaVantage (price data) - only when an API key is configured and explicitly used; requests include IP/client data per their policies.

data.name: ThirdParty_NuGetPackages
data.value: NuGet packages

data.name: ThirdParty_TestPackages
data.value: Test packages

data.name: Label_TestsOnly
data.value: tests only

data.name: Section_Privacy
data.value: Privacy

data.name: Privacy_SessionCookie
data.value: This application uses a session/auth cookie (fm_auth) to manage signed-in sessions. The cookie contains a JWT token used solely for authentication.

data.name: Privacy_ThirdParty
data.value: When using external services (e.g., price lookups), data (IP address, request timestamp) may be transmitted to those providers. Please refer to their privacy policies.

data.name: Section_Other
data.value: Other information

data.name: Other_Disclaimer
data.value: No guarantee for correctness. Use at your own risk. No financial or investment advice.

data.name: Other_Contact
data.value: Contact/Feedback: Issues and discussions welcome in the GitHub repository.
